Package model

Class Album

java.lang.Object
model.Album
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Album extends Object implements Serializable
The Album class represents a photo album containing a collection of photos. It implements the Serializable interface for object serialization.
See Also:

    • getPhotos

      public ArrayList<Photo> getPhotos()
      Retrieves a list of all Photo objects in the album.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all Photo objects.

    • addPhoto

      public boolean addPhoto(Photo p)
      Adds a Photo object to the album.
      Parameters:
      p - The Photo object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the Photo was added successfully, false if the photo already exists in the album.

    • deletePhoto

      public boolean deletePhoto(Photo p)
      Deletes a Photo object from the album.
      Parameters:
      p - The Photo object to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the Photo was deleted successfully, false if the photo was not found.

      public int numPhotos()
      Retrieves the number of photos in the album.
      Returns:
      The number of photos in the album.

    • findPhoto

      public Photo findPhoto(String path)
      Finds a Photo object in the album based on the photo path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the photo to find.
      Returns:
      The Photo object corresponding to the path, or null if not found.

    • getDateRange

      public String getDateRange()
      Retrieves the date range of the album (start date - end date).
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the date range, or null if no photos exist in the album.
